DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare incidence rate target infection , malignancy mortality among patient rheumatoid arthritis treat abatacept treated anti-rheumatic medication .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Abatacept Treat Rheumatoid Arthritis ( B )
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis > 18 year index treatment initiation switch Starting treatment abatacept new diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( include switch add ) biologic disease modify drug . Read/write English
